scripts.text:
WITH
SQ_DCIMBuildingStage AS (
	SELECT
		DCIMBuildingStageId,
		LineId,
		IMLocationId,
		IMBuildingId,
		SessionId,
		Id,
		ConstructionCode,
		Description,
		DoorType,
		NumberOfStories,
		RoofCovering,
		RoofDeckAttachment,
		RoofGeometry,
		RoofWallConstruction,
		Sprinkler,
		SquareFt,
		WindowProtection,
		WindstormLossMitigation,
		YearBuilt,
		IMLocationXmlId,
		ExtractDate,
		SourceSystemId
	FROM DCIMBuildingStage
),
EXP_Metadata AS (
	SELECT
	DCIMBuildingStageId,
	LineId,
	IMLocationId,
	IMBuildingId,
	SessionId,
	Id,
	ConstructionCode,
	Description,
	DoorType,
	NumberOfStories,
	RoofCovering,
	RoofDeckAttachment,
	RoofGeometry,
	RoofWallConstruction,
	Sprinkler,
	SquareFt,
	WindowProtection,
	WindstormLossMitigation,
	YearBuilt,
	IMLocationXmlId,
	ExtractDate,
	SourceSystemId,
	@{pipeline().parameters.WBMI_AUDIT_CONTROL_RUN_ID} AS o_AuditId
	FROM SQ_DCIMBuildingStage
),
ArchDCIMBuildingStage AS (
	INSERT INTO @{pipeline().parameters.TARGET_TABLE_OWNER}.ArchDCIMBuildingStage
	(DCIMBuildingStageId, LineId, IMLocationId, IMBuildingId, SessionId, Id, ConstructionCode, Description, DoorType, NumberOfStories, RoofCovering, RoofDeckAttachment, RoofGeometry, RoofWallConstruction, Sprinkler, SquareFt, WindowProtection, WindstormLossMitigation, YearBuilt, IMLocationXmlId, ExtractDate, SourceSystemId, AuditId)
	SELECT 
	DCIMBUILDINGSTAGEID, 
	LINEID, 
	IMLOCATIONID, 
	IMBUILDINGID, 
	SESSIONID, 
	ID, 
	CONSTRUCTIONCODE, 
	DESCRIPTION, 
	DOORTYPE, 
	NUMBEROFSTORIES, 
	ROOFCOVERING, 
	ROOFDECKATTACHMENT, 
	ROOFGEOMETRY, 
	ROOFWALLCONSTRUCTION, 
	SPRINKLER, 
	SQUAREFT, 
	WINDOWPROTECTION, 
	WINDSTORMLOSSMITIGATION, 
	YEARBUILT, 
	IMLOCATIONXMLID, 
	EXTRACTDATE, 
	SOURCESYSTEMID, 
	o_AuditId AS AUDITID
	FROM EXP_Metadata
),
